titles.title: A joint resolution prohibiting the sale to Honduras of certain defense articles and related defense services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere, Peace Corps. Hearings held.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported to Senate by Senator Pell without amendment. With written report No. 100-63. Additional views filed.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 156.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

committee.subcommittee: Western Hemisphere and Peace Corps Affairs
committee.name: Senate Foreign Relations

bill.summary: 5/13/1987--Introduced. Prohibits the proposed sale to Honduras of 12 F-5E/F aircraft with spares, munitions, support equipment, and training.
